title: Mr Boukadoum takes part in the swearing-in ceremony of the President of Uganda
text: The Minister of Foreign Affairs, Mr. Sabri Boukadoum, took part this Wednesday, as representative of the President of the Republic, Mr. Abdelmadjid Tebboune, in the swearing-in ceremony of the President of the Republic of Uganda, Mr. Yoweri Museveni.

On this occasion, the Minister handed a letter from President Tebboune to his Ugandan counterpart and conveyed his congratulations and wishes for success of his new mandate, reaffirming his commitment to further strengthen the historic ties of friendship, cooperation and of solidarity that exist between the two countries.
On the sidelines of the ceremony, Mr. Boukadoum had talks with several of his African counterparts, for consultations on regional and international issues of common interest.
